availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Watkins (Allen County, Kentucky, captain 52nd KY Inf USA )

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy C. Thomas Watkins in Allen County on July 31, 1860. Served in the 52nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as captain from October 16, 1863, to January 18, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 176A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Allen County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 51.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 454.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 512, 954.
